title: Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description:
Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)

Issue:

It takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown during this process.

NOTES:
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) for the changes to be reflected. No busy cursor is shown during this process.
EB: When updating the checked state of the table, the changes should be reflected instantly. A busy cursor should be shown during this process to indicate that the system is busy.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:

1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Go to the Export Zip feature.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose the file types you want to export.
5. Press the 'OK' button.
